programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Is It a Boy or a Girl?: Before heading out for the day's work, Bubba notices one of his colts is missing, and the guys go searching for the young horse before it is injured. At the urging of his grandmother, Booger ventures into the world of Internet dating, hoping to find a serious girlfriend. After Bubba's trusted horse gets sick, he asks Booger to help him break in a new colt. Cody and Misty finally find out if they are having a little cowboy or cowgirl, and they plan a party to reveal the gender to friends and family.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Leading the Pack: The cowboys compete in the first immunity challenge and take on a treacherous elimination challenge inspired by The Man from Snowy River.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Into The Wild Frontier - James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father: When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Drone'T Knock It 'Til You Try It: A ranching job in Texas inspires Cody to try and modernize their business with the help of technology, but Booger and Bubba are hesitant that it will be successful. Booger visits Matthew's school during parent's week to teach his classmates about cowboying. Bubba struggles with being away from his family for work and feels the pressure to keep their business close to home. A life-changing opportunity for Booger to compete at a world-renowned colt-starting competition leaves Cody and Bubba excited for their friend, but nervous about what it will mean for their business.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Handcrafted America - Sgrafitto Ceramics, Wood Tables and Steampunk Lamps: Host Jill Wagner travels the country on a quest to find talented craftsmen who still make incredible items by hand. First, in Lambertville, New Jersey, Jill visits the studio of ceramicist Katherine Hackl to learn the technique of sgraffito, the scratching of intricate patterns into the surface of pottery. Then, she's off to Kenosha, Wisconsin, where she meets Martin Antaramian, a young woodworker who is creating solid wood tables that look as if they are made of swirling fabric. Finally, she heads to Farmington, Minnesota, to see how lamp maker Shawn Carling turns castaway machine parts into hip, nostalgic lamps.

programme.title: State Plate
programme.desc: State Plate - Utah: Host Taylor Hicks gets a little salty when State Plate heads to Utah. First, he heads 5000 feet underground and jumps into the worlds' biggest salt grinder to mine the purest salt in the country. From there he starts his plate with a savory salt-crusted beef tenderloin. Next, Taylor goes for three side dishes that shout family and flavor. He discovers the many ways you can prepare Utah's official snack: Jell-O. Then he shares the secret behind the state's famous fry-sauce. And what in the world are funeral potatoes? Taylor finds a comforting casserole that's simply to die for. Finally, he feels the heat as he learns how to preserve Utah's celebrated cherry crop, and treats himself to tart cherry cookies that are simply divine.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Into The Wild Frontier - Joe Meek: Cunning Captive: A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones grow, their innate sense of wonder grows too, creating an occasion for celebration with each new discovery. Baby Galileo Discovering the Sky introduces them to that remarkable canopy above us: the sun and moon, fluffy clouds, shimmering stars, colorful planets and whirling galaxies.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Dive in with your little explorer across the seas to meet amazing animals living in the ocean, coral reef, and polar regions. Overflowing with underwater footage of whales, dolphins, tropical fish, and more, Neptune's Oceans invites you and your baby on an oceanic voyage of discovery!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. In terms of sight, bold patterns in contrasting colors or black and white are initially preferred. As for sounds, Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery: Voices From Many Lands acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Between 12 and 24 months, little ones become increasingly interested in more complex ideas and begin to explore numbers and counting. Numbers Nursery introduces little ones to numerals 1 through 5 in a captivating, interactive way that invites them to join in, clap their hands and count out loud.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As each day passes, babies' awareness of the world around them -- and all the wonders it holds -- continues to develop. Wild animals are especially intriguing and World Animals captures the spirtit of little ones' fascination with wild creatures as it introduces them to animals living in the jungle, in the ocean, and on the savannah.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. BABY'S FIRST MOVES is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Babies love animals, and now you can bring animals from the seven continents home to your baby. Meet dozens of exotic animals including Asian pandas, Australian kangaroos and Arctic snow monkeys...all filmed in their beautiful, natural habitats. Rhythms and songs inspired by faraway lands have been orchestrated especially for little ears and encourage your baby to sing, dance and play to the world beats. You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children making Christmas cards. Laa-Laa's present is some lovely decorations. When Noo-Noo tidies them up they tickle his throat, so he throws them out to decorate Home Hill.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A group of children sing some Christmas carols to the Teletubbies. Tinky Winky opens his present to find a beautiful star inside. The Teletubbies follow it all over Teletubbyland, but where will is end up?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and teaches the Teletubbies a winter nursery rhyme. Po's present is a little frosty cloud that begins to snow. All the Teletubbies laugh as they play in the snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies see some children visit a level crossing and watch a train pass by. The Teletubbies play their Ready, Steady, Go game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play a slide game before watching Becky and Jed look for eggs on their farm. Then their mum cooks them for their tea. In Teletubbyland, the Lion and Bear play their hide and seek game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies march up and down a hill and then they watch some children explore the colour pink. Tinky Winky doesn't know how to make Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa dances with her ball. A little boy tells us why he likes to live in his block of flats. A balloon appears in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies follow a balloon.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies giggle as they play their 'Through the Arch' game. The windmill stops them to watch a little girl and her dad go for a walk in the town.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies line up to say 'Eh-oh' and then watch Matthew and Mark feed a baby calf. The Teletubbies play a game to see who can eat their Tubby Custard the slowest, but Po can't wait and eats her Tubby Custard very fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the Naughty Pig. Dipsy's hat keeps blowing away and he has to chase it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa run into Home Hill to say 'Eh-oh', but where 's Po? Some children help their dad to wash his car. They get very wet and soapy.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop's friends give her a whistle to signal for them to play together. After Riff busts BJ's new scooter, he holds a rummage sale in order to buy a new one!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop cares for a caterpillar that is going through metamorphosis. After Rachel makes a mess in the park, she dreams about how littering affects many animal homes.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ's Chinese Pen Pal visits the park. Barney informs Baby Bop and BJ that their cousin Riff has moved into town!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Detective BJ helps Baby Bop figure out which animal is eating her snacks. Barney's friends help Detective Riff figure out where a strange noise is coming from.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Ryan decides that he wants to act and look just like Barney. Barney tells the kids a Native American story that teaches to be yourself and not follow to the crowd.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney teaches Baby Bop the importance of following the rules when playing games with friends. Baby Bop is frustrated about hearing "No" all the time.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney tells Ryan a story about how a boy became emperor by being honest. After BJ takes credit for Sarah's painting, Barney teaches him to always be honest with his friends.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop tries to convince to BJ and Riff that she had seen an elephant in the park. Barney introduces Riff of the best deaf musicians of all time - Beethoven.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: It's fun and games with Barney and his friends! BJ's favorite way of getting exercise is by playing sports and games. When Baby Bop is shy about trying new games, Barney and his friends show her how tee-rific trying something new can be.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney helps his friends discover just how fun numbers can be by taking them on a number hunt in the park. Baby Bop delights in sharing her favorite number and the kids discover that numbers can be found everywhere. With Barney and his friends, you can always count on a fun day!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Picture this! When Barney shows off his new painting, his friends are inspired to create their own art show. Discovering how to create new colors and draw shapes, Barney and his friends put on a super-dee-duper art show

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. "I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry!" says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's caf, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Sour wishes she could have a birthday all her very own, her twin sister Sweet grants her wish by forgoing celebrating her birthday. But what begins as a day that Sour has always dreamed of quickly becomes a disappointment when she misses her twin. With Strawberry's help, Sour gives her birthday back to Sweet with a special surprise.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Sour teasing Apple escalates into a "prank war" between the two of them. After the girls' feud disrupts the town, they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend. Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sour's influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality "makeover" on Apple.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some "groove booties" programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Ryan's World

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal toClay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some Master Plan. Suddenly, they realize Monsters led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lancefinally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the booksand now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayalthe Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towardsthe Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life past, present and potential future to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darknessforever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strangesinging and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremonyhe's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Powerbut it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBERhe tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is therehis full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of somethingMonstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an independent study he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threatagain. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more fight optimized. Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Nowthey can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS with hilarious results as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happensClay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounterTHE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro toMOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that? asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statueit's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. Andit's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can'tit had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robinhe will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compoundonly to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man, says Ava. I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel. What do you feel like? Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire, responds Merlok. That produced a combo with 2% efficiency, says Ava. This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration. The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the artsy elements.) it's not exactly perfect though he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed byJESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl in Town
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor Merlok the Magician has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friendMERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the ghost in the machine she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface, when he sends explosive, Robotnik snake probes drilling deep under ground in search of oil lakes.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails brings a new friend home to Knothole - a baby Terra-Pod who has strayed from the herd that is currently migrating. Sonic, Sally, and some of the other Freedom Fighters return the Baby-T to its mom and the rest of the herd.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic reluctantly takes Tails with him to the Big City to find some cotter pins for the Freedom Fighters catapults. While in the City, Sonic is nearly eaten alive by his old dog Muttski, now a roboti-sized guard dog in the Junk Heaps

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters, with new addition, Dulcy, develop a De-Roboti-sizer and try it out on Bunnie. It's a success and, against Sally's wishes, Sonic battles Robotnik's newest weapon, a Virtual Reality Shriek-Bot.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia is invited to a debutante ball, but before she can be officially announced to society, she and her brothers, Manic and Sonic have an important mission.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs find out that Sonia has inherited a castle. She basks in the idea of having a castle for headquarters.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A speed enhancing fluid deemed Sonic Tonic is created by Robotnik to make him as fast as Sonic so that he may finally catch him.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs congregate on the Floating Island in their latest effort to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik decides to cripple Mobius' three major transit systems: Rail, Air, and Sea in order to fully gain control of the planet. Sonic has to circumnavigate the planet in order to save the day.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a robot coach -- the "Coachnik", to put S and G through a "Training Camp" to improve their skills. Then Coachnik puts a bomb in Grounder's head as a booby trap for Sonic, and a football game ensues with Grounder's head as the ball.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang follow Diablos Nacho to Molemound - the Molenoid home cavern. Pronto doesn't want to go - and not because he's in trouble. It turns out Pronto is the rightful KING of the Molenoids. He's been ducking the crown for years since the king's main responsibility is settling arguments and fixing leaky plumbing. But Pronto must play king for a day while the Shane Gang follows Nacho into the great Molenoid library to stop him from taking a valuable map.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Our heroes are lured into an elaborate game by a twisted villain calling himself the Game Master. The Shane Gang must use every bit of skill they have to pass each level, but there is a devious twist: every slug they fire is captured, with the promise that they'll see them again only if they manage to make it to the end. That's becoming all the more difficult with fewer and fewer slugs.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Burpy is sick, and the only thing that will cure him is a trip to the Lightwell - a mysterious, hidden power source only slugs (and the Shadow Clan) know the way to. Burpy can't make it on his own, so Eli vows to take him there. He convinces the Shadow Clan to point the way, but the journey is fraught with peril. Meanwhile the rest of the Shane Gang must fight side by side with the Shadow Clan when Blakk's minions attack.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A mysterious creature is draining the energy from all the slugs in a distant cavern, and the residents are offering a rich reward to whoever can stop it. Mercenaries come out of the woodwork hoping for the prize, but the Shane Gang aim to stop it for free. That's what they do. It turns out this creature is more dangerous than anyone could imagine, and one by one, the hunters are taken out of the game-leaving only Eli and the reviled STOCKER remaining.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk has been captured! Now it's up to the Shane Gang to transport him to Stalagmite 17, the only prison that can hold him. To do so, they're going to need some serious speed. That's just what they get when we reveal Kord's new modifications to their Mecha Beasts! But will it be enough to stand up to Blakk's own newly-designed super vehicles?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: While the rest of the Shane Gang defend the perimeter from the legions of Blakk Guards sent to free Dr. Blakk from prison, Eli interogates the captured villain. Surprisingly, Blakk feels like talking. He reveals where he came from, how and why he discovered ghouls and most importantly of all, Eli learns the truth about what happened to his father.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli's got a new slug recruit! But in the heat of battle, can this rookie go from frightened novice to the hero of the day?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk and his Darkbane minions have discovered a way to make their ghouls faster and stronger - giving them an edge over the Shane Gang. In order to even the odds, Eli is going to need his most powerful slugs and an upgraded blaster from Redhook. The only problem is, Dr. Blakk already has the slingersmith working for him... Eli and the gang attempt a daring rescue mission to free Redhook, but along the way discover Blakk has a much more sinister plan in the works.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk has succeeded in creating a gap in the magical slug-energy barrier that protects Slugterra, opening the way for the evil Darkbane to tunnel their way up from the Deep Caverns. Eli and the Shane gang must stop this at any cost. Now armed with a selection of upgraded slugs, blasters and armor, they take the battle to Dr. Blakk's front door. While his team slugs it out against Dr. Blakk's minions, Eli takes on Blakk himself once and for all!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli and the Shane Gang have vanquished Dr. Blakk. But a new threat emerges from beyond the 99 caverns.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Dark Slinger and his marauders have invaded Slugterra! But there's more to this new threat than meets the eye. Eli must fight a very different kind of duel to save Slugterra...and himself.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A new member joins the Shane Gang! His name is Junjie, and he is a master of the mysterious slugslinging art of Slug Fu. But even with the power of five slingers, the Shane Gang find themselves in over their heads trying to protect the ancient Elemental Slugs.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang and Junjie race across the 99 caverns to keep the Elemental Slugs out of the hands of the Goon.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: To save Slugterra and the Elemental Slugs reaches its climax as the Shane Gang face a final showdown.

programme.title: The Golden Butterfly -Winx Club
programme.desc: As outside of Alfea the fight between the Trix and the Alfea's fairies goes on, the Winx use their Stones of Memories to go back to Alfea in the past. The Winx meet Mavilla and young Faragonda, asking them to help them finding the Golden Butterfly, the only animal that can give light and energy again to the Heart of Alfea. Thanks to the Tynix power, the Winx enter the Flower MiniWorld bumping into the Trix, on the back of their magic animals: now, with the Ultimate Power in their hands, they can travel to any place linked to the Fairy Animals. To protect the Golden Fairy, Bloom is taken by surprise by Icy, who fires a magic blow against her to make her fall into an ice trap

programme.title: Tall Tale Trio
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire by making up three outrageous, hysterical accounts of what held them up.

programme.title: Berry Big Tale-Teller
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story. Sweet is thrilled when everyone applauds her, even Sour, who is impressed by her contribution and proud of her sister.

programme.title: Foods that start with Q
programme.desc: Can you name a food that starts with Q? Avery makes Quiche with Chef Jean-Jacques Texier. Lily visits a sheep farm to find out about a creamy, little known cheese called Quark. Back in the kitchen, they take on Matt's Quirky Quesadilla challenge.

programme.title: Foods for The Brain
programme.desc: Lily knows the smartest way to start the day is with a good breakfast, and meets Chef Donna Dooher to make Green Eggs and Ham. Avery visits a centre that researches fish. Matt keeps score as the two face-off with blueberry and strawberry deserts that help build brain power.

programme.title: On with the show, Percival Learns to Dance, Hide & Seek
programme.desc: EP22: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, welcomed by the princess and the Knight.EP23: oom! Boom! Boom! The ground shakes a little in the World of Enchantment : it's Percival the dragon who tries to learn how to dance with a balloonEP24: The princess is playing hide-and-seek and asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to help her find the Fearless Knight, and Percival the dragon.

programme.title: Percival makes a Present, A Surprise for Percival, A Day at The Circus
programme.desc: EP25: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland, they find Percival who has an idea for his mum's birthday: he wants to offer her a pearl necklace.EP26: Tijinou and Tijibelle meet the Fearless Knight. He brings a huge basket to the princess, because she is organising a surprise for Percival, the dragon.EP27: The puppy Hot Dog, Percival the dragon and Super Hero are plotting something with Rigolini the clown when Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in Wonderland.

programme.title: It's A Crazy, Crazy World
programme.desc: The Winx decide to go back to Alfea with their Fairy Animals: in order to catch them, Kalshara has to find a way to enter the school for fairies. But, suddenly, the Winx are called by Roxy for an emergency: the weather in Ethiopia has gone crazy, threatening the cranes that migrated over there. Together with the Pixies, the six fairies get to Ethiopia, but then they have to use their Tynix power to enter the Sundial MiniWorld and sort things out. Before going back home, the Winx find a little Digmole that says it's searching for its own fairy, Faragonda!

programme.title: The Kingdom Of Diamonds -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Digmole the Winx show to Faragonda says it's bonded with the Alfea headmistress, but Faragonda has vague memories about it. Bloom explains that this could be due to the fact that the previous headmistress, Mavilla, cancelled all the memories of the Alfea fairies about the Fairy Animals. As they are speaking, Bloom has an intuition: she realizes that the animal with the First Colour of the Universe is the small statue representing a Digmole taken by Faragonda in the past as it is made of diamond, it reflects all the colours of light. The Winx shrink to enter the Adamantine MiniWorld and there they find a diamond that has the Ultimate Power, but a sudden collapse of the orchard-greenhouse buries Flora under a pile of rocks

programme.title: Blippi Visits Kennedy Space Center
programme.desc: Blippi visits the Kennedy Space Center and learns about space!

programme.title: The Berry Bitty Great Race
programme.desc: Apple isn't paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling "Tall Tales." So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: The Berry Best Taste Test
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: Foods that Smell
programme.desc: Lily and Avery follow their noses to find out what gives foods their amazing aromas. Avery enjoys a super garlicky Caesar salad, and then tries to sniff out a cure for his ghastly garlic breath. Lily makes a splash at the fish market where she gets to the bottom of seafood's suspicious smells. Together, they take on the ultimate olfactory challenge: recreating Matt's Amazing Seafood Chowder, by sense of smell alone!

programme.title: Foods that Melt
programme.desc: Watch foods melt before your eyes! Chill out as Lily tries to solve the mystery behind Baked Alaska, a frozen dessert that doesn't melt in the oven. Onthe hunt for a simple snack, Avery visits a local cheese shop and discovers there's moreto cheese than just cheddar! Back at the kitchen with Matt, Lily and Avery use a varietyof cheeses and fresh veggiesto see who can make thebest twist on an ooey-gooey melted favourite: grilled cheese sandwiches!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Roblox Escape!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: JillianTubeHD | Jillian's World!
programme.desc: Join YouTube star, JillianTubeHD, as she makes everything from delicious desserts to gold, glittery slime!

programme.title: KidCity | Ginormous Fun!
programme.desc: Play along with the KidCity family Little Flash, Ava, DadCity, and MomCity in all their kid-friendly games!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Spooky Adventures!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: Challenge Squad | IRL Games!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Gaming Survival!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Aloha, HobbyKids!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: Nate is Late
programme.desc: Nate and Malika arrive to school late every morning because something amazing always happens on the way - not that the principal ever believes them.

programme.title: Franklin and Friends
programme.desc: "Franklin and Friends," based on the children's book series featuring Franklin, is a computer-animated series geared toward preschoolers that aims to teach the kids lessons. The series follows Franklin the turtle, now older than in the books and previous TV series, as he experiences adventures and achieves milestones in the community of Woodland, learning lessons along the way. Franklin's friends referenced in the title include best friend Bear, problem-solving Snail, practical joker Rabbit, natural leader Beaver, inventive Fox and empathetic Goose. The series tackles issues that include personal empowerment, socialization, self-esteem, appreciation of nature and school issues.

programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Back safe, Miss Dottie takes the stage, this time with her new pal Rumble! // Rev is determined to master Rumble's new wrecking-ball attachment, but things quickly get out of hand when the duo refuse to ask for help. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev's dad tells about him about treasure sunken in the pond, Rev and Avery set out on a pirate adventure! They outfit Rumble and Alley with new dive equipment to salvage the long-lost toys and cherished memories found within the chest. // When Rev's cousin Katie comes to visit, Avery's jealousy gets the best of her-Avery always thought she was the coolest girl Rev knew! Intent on outdoing Katie, Avery pulls a stunt that she comes to regret.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev wants to surprise his friends with a movie celebrating their friendship, so he secretly gathers footage to show they're the best friends ever. When Avery realizes what he's up to, she adds her own clips to the movie - surprising Rev as well! // Owen hosts a virtual review of the gang's adventures with Rev and Rumble, plus all of their awesome gear! He walks his viewers through some of their most memorable moments, from mega stunts to monsters to rescue missions.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After many years of working hard on Accelerator Acres, Tilly the tractor is ready to retire from ranch life. Rev wants to find her the perfect new job, but his ideas are too intense for old Tilly. He'll have to adjust to her slower pace first. // Rev and the gang compete for the title of Best Prankster-except Lori sits out, claiming pranks aren't her thing. After a full day of pranks and laughs, the kids gather for the big party that Lori planned for them...but all is not as it seems!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Upset, he leads an all-out effort to convince her to stay, showing her that Fender Bend is the best place to live-despite Avery's protests that she's too busy. Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?
